code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL='https://rickandmortyapi.com/api';export const fetchCharacters=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/character"));return response.data;};export const fetchCharacterById=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/character/").concat(id));return response.data;};
